A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Really disappointed with the sequel trilogy so far. It feels like they bring back the old characters to have at fans' nostalgia\, then butcher them figuratively and literally. Meanwhile\, the new characters are left alive and fine despite being nowhere near as compelling as the old characters. If you're a white guy\, you''re dumbed down and out of character! The only thing these movies have done for me is give me a newfound appreciation for the all six of the original Lucas movies- even the prequels. Lucas should have NEVER sold to Disney!
